LocaleLayout.title: Alex Portfolio | Full-Stack Developer
LocaleLayout.description: Full-Stack Developer specializing in React, Next.js, and modern web technologies. Check out my projects and skills.

hero.name: Oleksandr Kochish
hero.title: Frontend Developer
hero.subtitle: I create modern and interactive web applications. Specializing in React, Vue and modern development approaches.

about.title: About Me
about.description1: I am a <highlight>frontend developer</highlight> with over 2 years of experience in creating modern web applications. I specialize in building <highlight>intuitive interfaces</highlight> and <highlight>optimized performance</highlight>.
about.description2: Constantly learning new technologies and best practices. I believe in <highlight>clean code</highlight>, <highlight>testing</highlight>, and <highlight>continuous learning</highlight>.
about.description3: In my free time, I experiment with new frameworks, contribute to open-source projects, and share knowledge with the community.

skills.title: Skills & Technologies
skills.subtitle: Constantly evolving and learning new tools to create better products

projects.title: My Projects
projects.subtitle: Here are my key works - from concept to implementation

project.description1: Full-featured e-commerce platform with modern UI, shopping cart, payment system and admin panel. Optimized for performance and UX.
project.description2: Interactive analytics dashboard with charts, tables and real-time metrics. Dark/light theme support.
project.description3: Mobile task management app with offline mode, notifications and cross-device synchronization.
project.description4: Scalable REST API with authentication, Swagger documentation, caching and performance monitoring.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: Ready to discuss new projects and collaboration opportunities
